page.title: 14A DAY IN THE LIFE
page.content: { A DAY IN THE LIFE OF SIMON When I get up I play with my farm for a minute or two. When I have done that I get dressed and clean my teeth then I go downstairs for breakfast. I live on a farm so I go down to the yard and let my hens out, then I feed them. When I have fed my hens I come in and get my bag and coat and walk to the top of the lane. I wait there for my lift. When the lady picks me up she takes me to school with two other children. When I get to school I hang my coat and bag up and play football until the headmaster calls me in. First I do reading then I do spellings and writing. When school is over I come home and turn on the TV. I watch all the childrens programmes then I have to do my work. First I get my baby duck in and help with the cows then we all have dinner and go to bed.
